Title: Introducing the Unified Clipchamp Start Page in Microsoft 365

![](https://i0.wp.com/dellenny.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/videoediting.png?fit=711%2C708&ssl=1)

**Video creation has officially entered the Microsoft 365 productivity suite.** With the new unified Clipchamp start page, Microsoft is streamlining the way individuals and teams create, edit, and manage videos—right alongside their documents, spreadsheets, and presentations.

Whether you’re producing a quick explainer video, crafting employee onboarding content, or building social media assets, Clipchamp’s deep integration with Microsoft 365 makes the experience faster, more accessible, and more collaborative than ever before.

## What Is Clipchamp?

**Clipchamp** is Microsoft’s web-based video editor designed for speed, simplicity, and creativity. Built with modern storytelling in mind, it’s ideal for professionals who need high-quality videos without the complexity of traditional editing software.

### Clipchamp Highlights:

- Drag-and-drop editing with an intuitive timeline
- Pre-built templates for business, education, and marketing
- Screen and webcam recording
- Text overlays, transitions, and branding tools
- AI voiceovers and auto-captioning features
- Seamless cloud saving via OneDrive or SharePoint

Until now, Clipchamp has existed slightly outside the traditional Microsoft 365 flow—but that’s changing.

## What’s New: A Unified Start Page for Clipchamp

Microsoft has introduced a **unified Clipchamp start page** that lives directly within the Microsoft 365 interface—just like Word, Excel, and PowerPoint.

This update brings Clipchamp into the heart of your daily productivity tools and makes video creation as accessible as opening a document.

### ✨ Key Features:

- **Familiar M365 Interface:** The Clipchamp home page mirrors the look and feel of other Microsoft 365 apps, making it easy for users to navigate.
- **All-in-One Hub:** Access recent projects, starred files, and shared videos in one view.
- **Launch from Anywhere:** Open Clipchamp directly from Office.com, the Microsoft 365 app launcher, or pinned apps in your sidebar.
- **Cloud Integration:** Projects can be saved and shared via OneDrive and SharePoint, ensuring your videos are secure and easily accessible from any device.
- **Collaborative Editing:** Share video projects with colleagues for feedback and iteration—no downloading required.
- **Template Jumpstart:** Quickly start a project using curated templates for business, education, training, or marketing use cases.

## Why This Matters

Video is no longer just a marketing or creative team task—it’s becoming a **core communication tool** across departments. From internal messaging and product explainers to virtual events and training, teams everywhere are embracing video.

By embedding Clipchamp in Microsoft 365, Microsoft is making video creation:

- **Easier** — You don’t need to learn complex software or jump between platforms
- **Faster** — Start creating instantly from your M365 dashboard
- **Smarter** — Use built-in templates, AI tools, and cloud storage to streamline your workflow
- **Collaborative** — Share and co-create with your team like you do with Word and PowerPoint files

## Who Gets Access?

The unified Clipchamp start page is rolling out to **Microsoft 365 commercial and education users**, provided Clipchamp is enabled by your IT admin. If you’re already using Microsoft 365, you may see Clipchamp appear in your app launcher or at Office.com.

Administrators can manage access and licensing just like any other M365 app, and users can start projects directly from the cloud without needing any local installation.

The modern workplace demands new tools—and Microsoft is responding by bringing creative power into its productivity suite. With Clipchamp’s unified start page in Microsoft 365, video content is no longer an extra step—it’s built into your everyday workflow.

So go ahead—**record that pitch, explain that process, introduce that new idea—on camera.** Clipchamp is now right where you need it.

**Lights, camera, productivity.**
